like thanks for being such a buzzkill

summary: Unpopular opinion, but it seems like with  almost any new trailer for a movie, game, show, etc. that comes out these days, it's...
body:
Unpopular opinion, but it seems like with almost any new trailer for a movie, game, show, etc. that comes out these days, it’s a trendy thing on this hellsite to immediately find one thing wrong with it and tear it apart, completely overlooking all of the other qualities that are actually good, thus destroying any kind of excitement to watch said thing.

New Pokemon movie? Any longtime fan has been waiting to see their favorite little monsters come to life on the big screen. “What, they actually have FUR?? THIS IS AWFUL. CANCEL IT!”

New Sonic the Hedhehog movie? Yeah of course he’s been the subject of ridicule for years, but some people still have a special place in their heart for that sarcastic little blue guy. “What, he’s also FURRY?? FUCK THIS MOVIE, CANCEL IT!”

New CGI Lion King movie? Disney revamping their old movies for profit is a whole other animal to tackle, but hey look. All the lions are voiced by POC (minus the comic relief characters) , I’m actually interested in seeing how it plays out. “What, the lions DON’T MAKE FACES?? HOW DARE THEY, CANCEL IT!”

“What’s that?? People still aren’t convinced that this is absolute trash and still wanna watch it despite it not being a 100% pure perfect masterpiece??? HOW DARE THEY, TRASH IT MORE AND CANCEL THEM!!”

TL;DR Of course these movies aren’t perfect and they still have flaws, but seriously guys, it getting really depressing to get on here everyday and see more hate circling around for something that despite it not being perfect, I still wouldn’t mind checking it out. Please tone it down.

body:
Sunday’s Mission

Go to Target and get me my Pikachu plushie

Go to Burger King and order a kid’s meal so I can get a Pokémon toy.

Go to 7-Eleven and get my Pokémon straws.

OMG IS IT MAY YET
